page.title: 04CENTRAL HILLINGDON PLAN
page.content: This plan has been produced by the council to guide and control growth in the central part of the Borough between the A40 and M4. The plan aims to protect and enhance many of the elements of the enviroment while providing for shopping,employment, leisure and transport for the people in the area.The majority of new development is to be concentrated in three types of location:the town centres of Uxbridge,Hayes and West Drayton/Yiewsley;the industrial areas;and six key sites where large scale new developments including industrial,shopping and leisure centres are proposed along with improvements to open land nearby.
